signature_matches.description: Non-zero exit code suggests an error during the execution. Lookup the error code for hints.

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Executes the "systemctl" command used for controlling the systemd system and service manager
Uses the "uname" system call to query kernel version information (possible evasion)
Sample reads /proc/mounts (often used for finding a writable filesystem)
Reads CPU information from /sys indicative of miner or evasive malware
Reads system information from the proc file system

T1518.001.description: Uses the "uname" system call to query kernel version information (possible evasion)

T1083.description: Sample reads /proc/mounts (often used for finding a writable filesystem)

Reads system information from the proc file system
